Text:
I was waiting for this!

Thanks Yify and please give us more 3D content :)

Thanks! 3D was really not bad on this movie, and the story was not that much stupid as I thought it might be! 

Thanks again for providing quality 3D contents and please share more we love it :)

@YIFY your video encoding is awesome, but I still don't understand why you encode audio in stereo. Just because there are people out there who use a PS3 or some other crap instead of a real media player, all others have to suffer.
If you had the 5.1 sound, those losers could downmix it to stereo (ffmpeg is your friend) in matters of minutes.

thanks for this :)
